title: Fun question interested in the answers
body: If you could perma ban/remove a champ from league from each lane what champs would you choose?

replies.body:
Top: Fizz (he can go there)
Mid: Karthus (hes not even strong, I just hate him)
Jungle: Skarner (I hate him now, a disgrace to the one pre-rework)
ADC:  Maybe Vayne?
Support: Bard.

I only play support, so 

Remove this cancer:{{champion:53}} {{champion:53}} {{champion:53}}
